name: TweetStats
0:
”Alexa, ask tweet stats how many languages are used on Twitter.”
”Alexa, ask tweet stats what's trending in Seattle.”
”Alexa, ask tweet stats what percentage of tweets are in Romanian.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tweet stats
des:
Curious about languages on Twitter? Dying to know how many tweets are geotagged? Well look no further.
With Tweet Stats you can find the percent usage of any language or find out what's trending in your favorite city, country, or even the world!

Use "tweet stats" to have Alexa say your location's trends or what percentage of tweets are in your favorite language.

For a complete list of requests...
-Alexa, ask tweet stats how many tweets are geotagged
 ... what is trending in Belgium right now?
 ... what percentage of tweets are in ...
 ... how many languages are used on Twitter?
 ... what is trending? ... how about Baton Rouge

If you're stuck, just ask Tweet Stats for help!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
